narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.  Applicant wishes to be licensed as a Class A dealer.
Applicant shall send the license fee and a copy of the inspection report to the Regional Office within 20 days to:
USDA APHIS Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave
Bldg B MS3W11
Ft. Collins, CO  80526
Until the USDA license has been received, no regulated activities may be conducted.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
